results.title: But I'm a Cheerleader
results.brief_description: Megan is an all-American girl. A cheerleader. She has a boyfriend. But Megan doesn’t like kissing her boyfriend very much. And she’s pretty touchy with her cheerleader friends. Her conservative parents worry that she must be a lesbian and send her off to “sexual redirection” school, where she must, with other lesbians and gays learn how to be straight.

constellations_other.name: Thomas Edison
constellations_other.description: Thomas Edison helped establish cinema as an art-form and mass entertainment. Many of his early films were short and showed everyday activities like riding a bicycle.

results.title: Bush Mechanics
results.brief_description:
This off-beat series follows the exploits of the Bush Mechanics, a group of engaging Aboriginal characters, as they travel through central Australia.

Combining adventure, magic, realism and a distinctive brand of humour, Bush Mechanics provides an insight into both contemporary and traditional Aboriginal culture.
results.description:

Combining adventure, magic, realism and a distinctive brand of humour, Bush Mechanics provides an insight into both contemporary and traditional Aboriginal culture.

results.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
results.brief_description: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness. She is the Slayer.

constellations_other.name: Cartoon classics and criticism
constellations_other.description: A whole cavalcade of cartoons have successfully made the leap into arcades and onto consoles, but the relationship between cinema and videogames is far more likely to fizzle out.

constellations_other.name: Wild Stallion Mountain: Genre Mash-ups
constellations_other.description: The Bombay Royale are known for combining funk, disco and pop with the sounds of classical Indian music together with the soundtracks of Bollywood cinema. Their music videos similarly hybridise  genres and styles to create intoxicating visual mash-ups.

results.description: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness; to stop the spread of their evil and the swell of their number. She is the Slayer.
description_for_label: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness; to stop the spread of their evil and the swell of their number. She is the Slayer.

results.title: Bruce Almighty
results.brief_description: Bruce Nolan toils as a ‘human interest’ TV reporter in Buffalo, N.Y., but despite high ratings and the love of his girlfriend, Bruce is unfulfilled. At a bad day, he angrily ridicules God—and God responds by giving Bruce his powers.

constellations_other.name: Power and infamy
constellations_other.description: Beginning with an anamorphic image of Napoleon III, this Constellation focuses on representations of the distorted perspective of patriarchal power.

results.description: Bruce Nolan toils as a ‘human interest’ TV reporter in Buffalo, N.Y., but despite high ratings and the love of his girlfriend, Bruce is unfulfilled. At a bad day, he angrily ridicules God — and God responds by giving Bruce his powers.

results.title: Broad City
results.creator_credit: Jax Media and Paper Kite Productions
results.brief_description: Broad City follows two women throughout their daily lives in New York City, making the smallest and mundane events hysterical and disturbing to watch all at the same time.

constellations_other.name: Shadow play
constellations_other.description: Shadow play uses light and projection to tell stories – fundamentals that would evolve into cinematography. In the Wayang tradition, gunungan open and close performances and indicate scene changes and the puppets pass across the projection screen in a similar way to a wipe transition.

results.description: Broad City follows two women throughout their daily lives in New York City, making the smallest and mundane events hysterical and disturbing to watch all at the same time.
description_for_label: Broad City follows two women throughout their daily lives in New York City, making the smallest and mundane events hysterical and disturbing to watch all at the same time.

results.title: Brick Lane
results.creator_credit: Ruby Films, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Laura Jones, Sarah Gavron and Abi Morgan
results.brief_description: The grind of daily life as a Brick Lane Bangladessi as seen through the eyes of Nazneen (Chatterjee), who at 17 enters an arranged marriage with Chanu (Kaushik). Years later, living in east London with her family, she meets a young man Karim (Simpson).

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ruby Films, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Laura Jones, Sarah Gavron and Abi Morgan

results.title: Breaking Bad
results.creator_credit: Diane Mercer, Bryan Cranston, Sam Catlin, Moira Walley-Beckett, Melissa Bernstein, John Shiban, Patty Lin, Robb Wilson King, Karen Moore, Stewart Lyons, Kathleen Detoro, Thomas Schnauz, George Mastras, Peter Gould, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment and Sony Pictures Television
results.brief_description: When Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live. He becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness and an unrelenting desire to secure his family’s financial future at any cost as he enters the dangerous world of drugs and crime.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Diane Mercer, Bryan Cranston, Sam Catlin, Moira Walley-Beckett, Melissa Bernstein, John Shiban, Patty Lin, Robb Wilson King, Karen Moore, Stewart Lyons, Kathleen Detoro, Thomas Schnauz, George Mastras, Peter Gould, Gran Via Productions, High Bridge Entertainment and Sony Pictures Television

results.title: Brazil
results.creator_credit: Embassy International Pictures, Terry Gilliam, Tom Stoppard, Charles McKeown, Norman Garwood, Patrick Cassavetti, Arnon Milchan and James Acheson
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1985
results.brief_description: Low-level bureaucrat Sam Lowry escapes the monotony of his day-to-day life through a recurring daydream of himself as a virtuous hero saving a beautiful damsel. Investigating a case that led to the wrongful arrest and eventual death of an innocent man instead of wanted terrorist Harry Tuttle, he meets the woman from his daydream, and in trying to help her gets caught in a web of mistaken identities, mindless bureaucracy and lies.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Embassy International Pictures, Terry Gilliam, Tom Stoppard, Charles McKeown, Norman Garwood, Patrick Cassavetti, Arnon Milchan and James Acheson

results.title: Brave
results.brief_description: Brave is set in the mystical Scottish Highlands, where Mérida is the princess of a kingdom ruled by King Fergus and Queen Elinor. An unruly daughter and an accomplished archer, Mérida one day defies a sacred custom of the land and inadvertently brings turmoil to the kingdom. In an attempt to set things right, Mérida seeks out an eccentric old Wise Woman and is granted an ill-fated wish. Also figuring into Mérida’s quest — and serving as comic relief — are the kingdom’s three lords: the enormous Lord MacGuffin, the surly Lord Macintosh, and the disagreeable Lord Dingwall.

results.title: Bran Nue Dae
results.creator_credit: MIFF Premiere Fund, Reg Cribb and Rachel Perkins
results.brief_description: In the Summer of 1965 a young man is filled with the life of the idyllic old pearling port Broome - fishing, hanging out with his mates and his girl. However his mother returns him to the religious mission for further schooling. After being punished for an act of youthful rebellion, he runs away from the mission on a journey that ultimately leads him back home.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: MIFF Premiere Fund, Reg Cribb and Rachel Perkins
